results.deck: Collection of Mana includes all three Seiken Densetsu games. In America, the first two were released as Final Fantasy Adventure and Secret of Mana. The third game, Seiken Densetsu 3 (Trials of Mana), was never localized to English.
results.description:
Overview

Collection of Mana is a compilation featuring Final Fantasy Adventure, Secret of Mana and Seiken Densetsu 3; the first three games in the World of Mana franchise (known as Seiken Densetsu in Japan). The compilation was released in Japan on June 1, 2017 and in the West on June 11, 2019. The latter marks the first Western release of Seiken Densetsu 3, which had never been officially localised into English up until that point, nearly 30 years after its initial Japanese release.
results.name: Collection of Mana

results.deck: A restaurant management game
results.description:
Chef: A Restaurant Tycoon Game is a simulation/management videogame. The game allows players to create their own unique Chef and starts their career in the world of cooking, starting with a small restaurant and an unskilled avatar and slowly climbing the stairs leading to international fame.

The game features most mechanics typical of the genre, like the staff management or restaurant customization, while having unique features related to the world of professional cooking: menus can be fully customized affecting the kind and number of customers visiting the place, a realistic recipe editor allows to combine more than 200 ingredients into unique recipes.
results.name: Chef: A Restaurant Tycoon Game
